subject: Soccer
World Cup 2014 (Soccer)
organizations: United States Men's National Soccer Team
lead_paragraph: A witch doctor from Ghana put a curse on the knees of Cristiano Ronaldo, Portugal’s star player in the World Cup. But apparently it’s not working very well.
snippet: A witch doctor from Ghana put a curse on the knees of Cristiano Ronaldo, Portugal’s star player in the World Cup. But apparently it’s not working very well.
